    About Us

    We love to mix elegance with that cozy home-town feeling. Evident in our drinks which are styled to fit your event perfectly, we don’t sacrifice the quality of the drinks for the quantity!

    Based in Christchurch NZ we currently aren’t offering mixologists for hire but we are looking to expand so keep an eye out!

    What happens next?

    -Once your order is places we will send you order and tracking information. This will contain everything you need to know!

    When should I order?

    - For events less than 5,000 cocktails we recommend ordering at least 15 days in advance to ensure we can get you the cocktails you want.

    Is there a limit?

    -We have a minimum order of 50 cocktails. There isn’t any maximum order, however for orders of more than 5,000 we recommend ordering at least 36 days in advance to ensure we can get you the cocktails you want.
